anya-e0903n4:3: Pucchā – mahāvaggasaṁyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ upaḍḍhasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:4_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante sakkare nāma sakyānaṁ nigame āyasmantaṁ ānandattheraṁ
anya-e0903n4:4_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘upaḍḍhamidaṁ
anya-e0903n4:4_2: bhante brahmacariyaṁ yadidaṁ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā’’ti.
anya-e0903n4:4_3: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘mā hevaṁ ānanda, mā hevaṁ ānanda, sakalamevidaṁ ānanda
anya-e0903n4:4_4: brahmacariyaṁ yadidaṁ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:5: Mamaṁ hi ānanda kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti.
anya-e0903n4:8: Pucchā – bojjhaṅgasaṁyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṁ saṁgītaṁ kuṇḍaliyasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:9_0: Vissajjanā – sākete bhante añjanavane migadāye kuṇḍaliyaṁ paribbājakaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:9_1: Kuṇḍaliyo bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ‘‘ahamasmi bho gotama ārāmanissayī
anya-e0903n4:9_2: parisāvacaro, tassa mayhaṁ bho gotama pacchābhattaṁ bhuttapātarāsassa ayamācāro hoti
anya-e0903n4:9_3: ārāmena ārāmaṁ uyyānena uyyānaṁ anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi, so tattha passāmi eke samaṇabrāhmaṇe
anya-e0903n4:9_4: itivādappamokkhānisaṁsañceva kathaṁ kathante upārambhānisaṁsañca, bhavaṁ pana gotamo
anya-e0903n4:9_5: kimānisaṁso viharatī’’ti etaṁ vacanaṁ avoca. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘vijjāvimuttiphalānisaṁso
anya-e0903n4:9_6: kho kuṇḍaliya tathāgato viharatī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:11: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavvatā jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena bojjhaṅgasaṁyutte dutiye gilānavagge paṭhamagilānasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:12_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante pippaliguhāyaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahākassapattheraṁ ārabbha
anya-e0903n4:12_1: bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante mahākassapatthero pippaliguhāyaṁ viharati ābādhiko dukkhito
anya-e0903n4:12_2: bāḷhagilāno. Atha kho bhante bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā
anya-e0903n4:12_3: mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi, nisajja kho bhagavā
anya-e0903n4:12_4: āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ etadavoca– ‘‘kacci te kassapa khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:12_5: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no abhikkamoti.
anya-e0903n4:12_6: Na me bhante khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:12_7: abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no paṭikkamo’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘sattime kassapa
anya-e0903n4:12_8: bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattantī’’ti
anya-e0903n4:14: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiye udāyivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṁ saṁgītaṁ udāyisuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:15_0: Vissajjanā – sumbhesu bhante setakenāma sumbhānaṁ nigame āyasmantaṁ udāyittheraṁ
anya-e0903n4:15_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante udāyitthero bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ‘‘acchariyaṁ
anya-e0903n4:15_2: bhante, abbhutaṁ bhante, yāva bahukatañca me bhante bhagavati pemañca gāravo ca hirī
anya-e0903n4:15_3: ca ottappañcāti evamādikaṁ vacanaṁ avoca. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘sādhu sādhu
anya-e0903n4:15_4: udāyi eso hi te udāyi maggo paṭiladdho. Yo te bhāvito bahulīkato, tathā tathā viharantaṁ
anya-e0903n4:15_5: tathattāya upanessati, yathā tvaṁ ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:15_6: nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānissatī’’ti. Evaṁ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:18: Pucchā – satipaṭṭhānasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhaka mahātherehi dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ satisuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ kārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:19: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante ambapālivane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘sato bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya sampajāno ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:21: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi catutthaṁ saṁgītaṁ sālasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:22_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante sālāyanāma kesalānaṁ brāhmaṇagāme sambahule bhikkhū
anya-e0903n4:22_1: ārabbha ‘‘ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:22_2: te vo bhikkhave bhikkhū catunnaṁ satipaṭṭhānānaṁ bhāvanāya samādapetabbā nivesetabbā
anya-e0903n4:24: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṁ saṁgītaṁ sakuṇagghisuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:25_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘bhūtapubbaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n4:25_1: sakuṇagghi lāpaṁ sakuṇaṁ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi. Atha kho bhikkhave lāpo sakuṇo
anya-e0903n4:25_2: sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṁ paridevasi mayamevamha alakkhikā, mayaṁ appapuññā, ye
anya-e0903n4:25_3: mayaṁ agocare carimha paravisaye, sacejja mayaṁ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye,
anya-e0903n4:25_4: na myāhaṁ sakuṇagghi alaṁ abhavissa yadidaṁ yuddhāyā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:27: Ko pana te lāpa gocaro sako pettiko visayo.
anya-e0903n4:29: Ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi,
anya-e0903n4:30: (Dāruguḷoviya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi. Aṭṭhakathā)
anya-e0903n4:31: Evañhi taṁ bhikkhave hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
anya-e0903n4:32: Tasmātiha bhikkhave mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
anya-e0903n4:33: Gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye.
anya-e0903n4:34: Gocare bhikkhave carataṁ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṁ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:36: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṁ saṁgītaṁ bhikkhunupassayasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:37_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ ānandattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n4:37_1: bhante ānando yāvattako ahosi bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato
anya-e0903n4:37_2: ārocesi. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘evametaṁ ānanda, evametaṁ ānanda, yohi koci ānanda
anya-e0903n4:37_3: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto viharati, tassetaṁ
anya-e0903n4:37_4: pāṭikaṅkhaṁ uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ sañjānissatī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:39: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiye nālandavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ cundasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:40_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁyeva ānandattheraṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n4:40_1: bhante ānandatthero cundena samaṇuddesena saddhiṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0903n4:40_2: bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho bhante āyasmā ānando
anya-e0903n4:40_3: bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘ayaṁ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso evamāha ‘āyasmā bhante sāriputto
anya-e0903n4:40_4: parinibbuto, idamassa pattacīvara’nti. Api ca me bhante madhurakajāto viya kāyo,
anya-e0903n4:40_5: disāpi me na pakkhāyanti, dhammāpi maṁ nappaṭibhanti ‘āyasmā sāriputto parinibbuto’ti
anya-e0903n4:40_6: sutvā’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘kiṁ nu kho te ānanda sāriputto sīlakkhandhaṁ
anya-e0903n4:40_7: vā ādāya parinibbuto, samādhikkhandhaṁ vā, paññākkhandhaṁvā, vimuttikkhandhaṁvā,
anya-e0903n4:40_8: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṁ vā ādāya parinibbuto’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:42: Tasmātihānanda attadīpā viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā.
anya-e0903n4:44: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ bāhiyasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:45_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ bāhiyaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante
anya-e0903n4:45_1: bāhiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetu,
anya-e0903n4:45_2: yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya’’nti.
anya-e0903n4:45_3: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘tasmātiha tvaṁ bāhiya ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0903n4:45_4: Ko cādikusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṁ diṭṭhica ujukā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:48: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiye sīlaṭṭhitivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dutiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ ciraṭṭhitisuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:49_0: Vissajjanā – pāṭaliputte bhante āyasmantaṁ bhaddaṁ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0903n4:49_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ. Āyasmā bhante bhaddo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito
anya-e0903n4:49_2: yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca ‘‘ko nu
anya-e0903n4:49_3: kho āvuso ānanda hetu ko paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko
anya-e0903n4:49_4: hoti, ko panāvuso ānanda hetu ko paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko
anya-e0903n4:49_5: hotī’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘sādhu sādhu āvuso bhadda, bhaddako kho te āvuso
anya-e0903n4:49_6: bhadda ummaṅgo’’ti evamādinā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:51: ‘‘Catunnaṁ kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānaṁ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī’’ –
anya-e0903n4:53_0: Pucchā – tassāvuso bhagavatā arahato sammāsambuddhassa pāvacanasamudayabhūtāya mahāvaggapāḷiyā
anya-e0903n4:53_1: satipaṭṭhānasaṁyutte sīlaṭṭhitivagge navamaṁ sirivaḍḍhasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha
anya-e0903n4:54_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sirivaḍḍhaṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0903n4:54_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ. Sirivaḍḍho bhante gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito
anya-e0903n4:54_2: bāḷhagilāno. Athakho bhante āyasmā ānando yenasirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ
anya-e0903n4:54_3: tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi . Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando sirivaḍḍhaṁ
anya-e0903n4:54_4: gahapatiṁ etadavoca ‘‘kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ, kacci dukkhā
anya-e0903n4:54_5: vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no abhikkamo’’ti. Na
anya-e0903n4:54_6: me bhante khamanīyaṁ, na yāpanīyaṁ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:54_7: abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no paṭikkamo’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘tasmātiha te
anya-e0903n4:54_8: gahapati evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ ‘kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
anya-e0903n4:54_9: loke abhijjhā domanassaṁ. Vedanāsu. Citte. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī
anya-e0903n4:54_10: sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa’nti. Evañhi te gahapati sikkhitabba’’nti.
anya-e0903n4:54_11: Evaṁ kho āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:57: Pucchā – iddhipādasaṁyutte āvuso catutthaṁ moggallānasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:58_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Sambahulā bhante
anya-e0903n4:58_1: bhikkhū heṭṭhāmigāramātupāsāde viharanti uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā
anya-e0903n4:58_2: muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā bhantacittā pākatindriyā. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ
anya-e0903n4:58_3: āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ te bhikkhū saṁvejetvā ‘‘kiṁ nu tumhe bhikkhave saṁviggā
anya-e0903n4:58_4: lomahaṭṭhajātā ekamantaṁ ṭhitā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:59: Acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
anya-e0903n4:62: Tumheva kho bhikkhave saṁvejetukāmena moggallānena bhikkhunā pādaṅguṭṭhakena migāramātupāsādo saṅkampito sampakampito sampadhālito.
anya-e0903n4:63: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave, katamesaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu evaṁ mahiddhiko evaṁ mahānubhāvo.
anya-e0903n4:66: Pucchā – anuruddhasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṁ saṁgītaṁ bāḷhaginānasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:67_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā anuruddhattherena
anya-e0903n4:67_1: bhāsitaṁ. Sambahulā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ bāḷhagilānaṁ
anya-e0903n4:67_2: etadavocuṁ ‘‘katamenāyasmato anuruddhassa vihārena viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā
anya-e0903n4:67_3: vedanā cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘catūsu kho
anya-e0903n4:67_4: me āvuso satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā
anya-e0903n4:67_5: cittaṁ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī’’ti evamādinā āyasmatā anuruddhattherena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:70: Pucchā – ānāpānasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṁ saṁgītaṁ mahākappinasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:71: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘passatha no tumhe bhikkhave etassa bhikkhuno kāyassa iñjitattaṁ vā phanditabbaṁ vā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:73: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge paṭhamaṁ icchānaṅgalasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:74_0: Vissajjanā – icchānaṅgale bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘sace kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyā
anya-e0903n4:74_1: paribbājakā evaṁ puccheyyuṁ ‘katame nāvuso vihārena samaṇo gotamo vassāvāsaṁ bahulaṁ
anya-e0903n4:74_2: vihāsī’ti. Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ evaṁ
anya-e0903n4:74_3: byākareyyātha ānāpānassatisamādhinā kho āvuso bhagavā vassāvāsaṁ bahulaṁ vihāsī’’ti
anya-e0903n4:77: Pucchā – sotāpattisaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ cakkavattirājasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:78_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘kiñcāpi bhikkhave rājā
anya-e0903n4:78_1: cakkavattī catunnaṁ dīpānaṁ issariyādhipaccaṁ rajjaṁ kāretvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ
anya-e0903n4:78_2: maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ sahabyataṁ, so tattha
anya-e0903n4:78_3: nandane vane accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto
anya-e0903n4:78_4: paricāreti so catūhi dhammehi asamannāgato, atha kho so aparimuttova nirayā, aparimutto
anya-e0903n4:78_5: tiracchānayoniyā, aparimutto pettivisayā, aparimutto apāyaduggativinipātā’’ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n4:80: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṁ saṁgītaṁ dīghāvuupāsakasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:81_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante dīghāvuṁ upāsakaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ. Bhagavā bhante dīghāvuṁ
anya-e0903n4:81_1: upāsakaṁ ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ bāḷhagilānaṁ etadavoca ‘‘kacci te dīghāvu khamanīyaṁ,
anya-e0903n4:81_2: kacci yāpanīyaṁ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṁ
anya-e0903n4:81_3: paññāyati no abhikkamo’’ti. Na me bhante khamanīyaṁ, na yāpanīyaṁ bāḷhā me dukkhā
anya-e0903n4:81_4: vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati no paṭikkamoti. Tasmiṁ
anya-e0903n4:81_5: bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘tasmātiha te dīghāvu evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ buddhe aveccappasādena
anya-e0903n4:82: Yānimāni bhante bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni desitāni, saṁvijjante te dhammā mayi–
anya-e0903n4:83: Tasmātiha tvaṁ dīghāvu imesu catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu patiṭṭhāya cha vijjābhāgiye dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi–
anya-e0903n4:84: Mā tvaṁ tāta dīghāvu evaṁ manasākāsi.
anya-e0903n4:85: Iṅgha tvaṁ tāta dīghāvu yadeva te bhagavā āha, tadeva tvaṁ sādhukaṁ manasikarohi.
anya-e0903n4:89: Dīghāvu bhikkhave upāsako pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
anya-e0903n4:91: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena sotāpattisaṁyutte sattamaṁ saṁgītaṁ veḷudvāreyyasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:92: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante veḷudvāre nāma kosalānaṁ brāhmaṇa gāme veḷudvāreyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:93_0: Veḷudvāreyyakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ ‘‘mayaṁ bho gotama
anya-e0903n4:93_1: evaṁkāmā evaṁchandā evaṁadhippāyā puttasambādhasayanaṁ ajjhāvaseyyāma…pe… jātarūparajataṁ
anya-e0903n4:93_2: sādiyeyyāma, kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjeyyāma, tesaṁ
anya-e0903n4:93_3: no bhavaṁ gotamo amhākaṁ evaṁkāmānaṁ evaṁchandānaṁ evaṁadhippāyānaṁ tathā dammaṁ
anya-e0903n4:93_4: desetu, yathā mayaṁ puttasambādhasayanaṁ ajjhāvaseyyāma…pe… kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā
anya-e0903n4:93_5: sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjeyyāmā’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘attūpanāyikaṁ
anya-e0903n4:93_6: vo gahapatayo dhammapariyāyaṁ desessāmi, taṁ suṇātha sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī’’ti
anya-e0903n4:96_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiye saraṇānivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi
anya-e0903n4:96_1: paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ paṭhamamahānāmasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:97_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ ārabbha
anya-e0903n4:97_1: bhāsitaṁ. Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘idaṁ bhante kapilavatthu
anya-e0903n4:97_2: iddhañceva phītañca bāhujaññaṁ ākiṇṇamanussaṁ sambādhabyūhaṁ, so khvāhaṁ bhante bhagavantaṁ
anya-e0903n4:97_3: vā payirupāsitvā manobhāvanīye vā bhikkhū sāyanhasamayaṁ kapilavatthuṁ pavisanto
anya-e0903n4:97_4: bhantenapi hatthinā samāgacchāmi, bhantenapi assena samāgacchāmi, bhantenapi rathena
anya-e0903n4:97_5: samāgacchāmi, bhantenapi sakaṭena samāgacchāmi, bhantenapi purisena samāgacchāmi,
anya-e0903n4:97_6: tassa mayhaṁ bhante tasmiṁ samaye mussateva bhagavantaṁ ārabbha sati, mussati dhammaṁ
anya-e0903n4:97_7: ārabbha sati, mussati saṅghaṁ ārabbha sati, tassa mayhaṁ bhante evaṁ hoti imamhi
anya-e0903n4:97_8: cāhaṁ samaye kālaṁ kareyyaṁ, kā mayhaṁ gati, ko abhisamparāyo’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante
anya-e0903n4:97_9: vatthusmiṁ ‘‘mā bhāyi mahānāma, mā bhāyi mahānāma, apāpakaṁ te maraṇaṁ bhavissati
anya-e0903n4:97_10: apāpikā kālaṁ kiriyā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:99: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ dutiyasaraṇānisakkasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:100: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme mahānāmaṁyeva sakkaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:101_0: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘idha bhante saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato,
anya-e0903n4:101_1: so bhagavatā byākato ‘sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti. Tatra
anya-e0903n4:101_2: sudaṁ bhante sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti ‘acchariyaṁ
anya-e0903n4:102_0: Bho , ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati, yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato,
anya-e0903n4:102_1: so bhagavatā byākato ‘sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti, saraṇāni
anya-e0903n4:102_2: sakko sikkhāya aparipūrakārī ahosī’’ti tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘yo so mahānāma
anya-e0903n4:102_3: dīgharattaṁ upāsako buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato, dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato, saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato,
anya-e0903n4:102_4: so kathaṁ vinipātaṁ gaccheyyā’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:104: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṁ saṁgītaṁ paṭhamaanāthapiṇḍikasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:105: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:106_0: Āyasmā bhbhante sāriputtatthero āyasmatā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena saddhiṁ yena
anya-e0903n4:106_1: anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane
anya-e0903n4:106_2: nisīdi, nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ ābādhikaṁ dukkhitaṁ
anya-e0903n4:106_3: bāḷhagilānaṁ etadavoca ‘‘kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṁ kacci yāpanīyaṁ, kacci dukkhā
anya-e0903n4:106_4: vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no abhikkamo’’ti,
anya-e0903n4:106_5: na me bhante khamanīyaṁ, na yāpanīyaṁ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n4:106_6: abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamoti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘yathā rūpena
anya-e0903n4:106_7: kho gahapati buddhe appasādena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṁ
anya-e0903n4:106_8: maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ niyaraṁ upapajjati tathārūpo te buddhe appasādo
anya-e0903n4:106_9: natthi, atthi ca kho te gahapati buddhe aveccappasādo ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho…pe…
anya-e0903n4:106_10: bhagavā’ti tañca pana te buddhe aveccappasādaṁ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā
anya-e0903n4:106_11: paṭippassambheyyā’’ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:110: Adaliddoti taṁ āhu, amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:115: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso puññābhisandavaggo porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṁ saṁgītaṁ mahānāmasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:116: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ mahānāmaṁ sakkaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:117_0: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hotī’’ti.
anya-e0903n4:117_1: Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘yato kho mahānāma buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti, dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ
anya-e0903n4:117_2: gato hoti, saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hotī’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:118: Kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hoti.
anya-e0903n4:120: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi navamaṁ saṁgītaṁ kāḷigodhasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ kārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:121_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kāḷigodhaṁ nāma sākiyāniṁ ārabbha ‘‘catūhi kho godhe
anya-e0903n4:121_1: dhammehi samannāgatā ariyasāvikā sotāpannā hoti avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā’’ti
anya-e0903n4:122: Lābhā te godhe, suladdhaṁ te godhe, sotāpattiphalaṁ tayā godhe –
anya-e0903n4:124: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena sotāpattisaṁyutte puññābhisandavagge dasamaṁ nandiyasakkasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:125_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme nandiyaṁ sakkaṁ ārabbha
anya-e0903n4:125_1: bhāsitaṁ. Nandiyo bhante sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘yasseva nu kho bhante ariyasāvakassa
anya-e0903n4:125_2: cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbena sabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ natthi, sveva nu kho bhante
anya-e0903n4:125_3: ariyasāvako pamādavihārī’’ti. Tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ ‘‘yassa kho nandiya cattāri
anya-e0903n4:125_4: sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbenasabbaṁ sabbathāsabbaṁ natthi, tamahaṁ bāhiro puthujjanapakkhe
anya-e0903n4:128: Pucchā – saccasaṁyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāyakamahātherehi dasamaṁ saṁgītaṁ tiracchānakathāsuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:129_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha mā bhikkhave anekavihitaṁ
anya-e0903n4:129_1: tiracchānakathaṁ katheyyātha. Seyyathidaṁ, rājakathaṁ corakathaṁ mahāmattakathaṁ
anya-e0903n4:129_2: senākathaṁ bhayakathaṁ yuddhakathaṁ annakathaṁ pānakathaṁ vatthakathaṁ sayanakathaṁ
anya-e0903n4:131: Tasmātiha bhikkhave idaṁ dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo…pe… ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0903n4:133_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dhammacakkappavattanavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi
anya-e0903n4:133_1: paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:134_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṁ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘dve
anya-e0903n4:134_1: me bhikkhave antā pabbajitena nasevitabbā. Katame dve, yo cāyaṁ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo
anya-e0903n4:134_2: hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito, yo cāyaṁ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho
anya-e0903n4:134_3: anariyo anatthasaṁhito, ete kho bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimāpaṭipadā tathāgatena
anya-e0903n4:136: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso koṭigāmavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ āsavakkhayasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:137_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘jānatohaṁ bhikkhave passato
anya-e0903n4:137_1: āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato apassato. Kiñca bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṁ
anya-e0903n4:137_2: khayo hoti, idaṁ dukkhanti bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, ayaṁ dukkhasamudayoti,
anya-e0903n4:137_3: ayaṁ dukkhanirodhoti, ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāti jānato passato āsavānaṁ
anya-e0903n4:137_4: khayo hoti. Evaṁ kho bhikkhave jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti. Tasmātiha
anya-e0903n4:137_5: bhikkhave ‘‘idaṁ dukkha’’nti yogo karaṇīyo, ayaṁ dukkhasamudayoti, ayaṁ dukkhanirodhoti,
anya-e0903n4:137_6: ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāti yogo karaṇīyo’’ti evaṁ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:139: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sīsapāvanavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ sīsapāvanasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:140_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṁ bhante sīsapāvane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha
anya-e0903n4:140_1: bhikkhave, katamaṁ nukho bahutaraṁ yāni vā mayā parittāni sīsapāpaṇṇāni pāṇinā gahitāni
anya-e0903n4:140_2: yadidaṁ upari sīsapāvane’’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n4:142: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṁgāhakamahātherehi pariyosānabhāvena saṁgīto pañcagatipeyyālavagge, bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kathañca bhāsito.
anya-e0903n4:143_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha ‘‘taṁ kiṁ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n4:143_1: katamaṁ nu kho bahutaraṁ, yo vāyaṁ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṁ paṁsu āropito, ayaṁ
anya-e0903n4:145: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0903n4:151: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0903n4:153: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
